content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (6.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient coal
- Ensure you have enough coal in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnaces. Regularly check your inventory and gather more coal if necessary.

### Errors when furnaces are missing coal
- When a furnace has iron ore but is missing coal, ensure to insert coal into the furnace to enable smelting. 

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Make sure to check the inventory of the furnace before inserting items to avoid attempting to insert when the furnace is full or out of fuel. 

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
